text: another perspective uncovered Ethiopia is not just sewing seeds it's reaping a tech-savvy agricultural revolution with drones monitoring crop health and apps connecting Farmers to markets it's plowing past its old image as te the ancient grain goes Global Ethiopia fields are becoming test beds for Innovation marrying tradition with technology so while history books might harp on hardship today's narrative is fertile with stories of growth and grit a Land once synonymous with scarcity now cult Ates a harvest of high-tech hope so here is
